title: I Cant Launch LoL
body: JEESUS CHRIST SOMEONE HELP ME I HAVE TRYED EVERYTHING I REINSTALLED THE GAME 100000000 TIMES I REPAIRED IT I OPENED IT AS AND ADMINSTATOR IT IS NOT WORKING AFTER PRESSING LAUNCH IT DESAPEARS MY BUT HURTS I AM 5 HRS HERE TRYING TO FIX THIS NOT ONLY TODAY BUT EVERY SINGLE DAY MY BUT HURTS SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME TELL ME ALL WAYS TO FIX IT

replies.body: got the same prob already tried things like turning p2p off but itss still soo sloooooo
player to player. a thing they used to do but just makes it slower apparently

So your client is opening but almost immediately closes back out? It definitely sounds like an issue with [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), so give the other steps in that guide a go. Hit me back up if that still doesn't help and I can dig a little deeper into what might be happening.
